channel.title: Theme on Notes of bvfnbk
channel.description: Recent content in Theme on Notes of bvfnbk

item.title: Creating a new Theme
item.description: My previously selected theme (m10c) is actually quite nice, it does not add too much eye candy (compared to others) and I liked the simple responsiveness. Though I found the generated pages to be a bit “packed”. To be honest, the only parts required to be changed in the end were parts of the stylesheets but then, I would have skipped an opportunity to learn something new. What do I want to achieve?
